ValidationRule.description: Check that the period is the same or before from the Active period of the Challenge.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( OR( ISBLANK(FieloCH__SubscribeFrom__c), ISNULL(FieloCH__SubscribeFrom__c) )), OR( FieloCH__InitialDate__c < FieloCH__SubscribeFrom__c, FieloCH__SubscribeFrom__c > FieloCH__SubscribeTo__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Subscription Initial Date cannot be greater than Subscription Final Date or greater than Challenge Initial Date
